data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Hrodna, Belarus to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Hrodna, Belarus

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Hrodna do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 220 new simple churches in the state of Hrodna, Belarus. Place a simple church in every community of the 1,100,000 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Hrodna.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Spirit, help the 18,475 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,081,525 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Hrodna, Belarus to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the state of Hrodna prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

location.name: Hrodna
location.people_groups_list: Korean, Kazakh, Tatar, Georgian, Uzbek, Southern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Korean (1,000), Kazakh (2,300), Tatar (7,100), Georgian (2,900), Uzbek, Southern (3,500)
